trans-unit.source: A static extension methods class for getting a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> instance from an <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Класс статического расширения методов для получения <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>экземпляра из <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage"> </xref> экземпляра.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> instance from an <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage"></xref> instance.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> instance can be read, written and copied just as a traditional <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessage> instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>Экземпляр для чтения, записи и скопированы только как традиционный <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessage>экземпляра.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ByteStreamMessage> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> instance can also "read" to retrieve the original <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage> instance by calling the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageExtensionMethods.ToHttpResponseMessage%2A> extension method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>Экземпляра можно также «чтение» для получения исходного <xref:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage>экземпляр путем вызова <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageExtensionMethods.ToHttpResponseMessage%2A>метода расширения.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageExtensionMethods.ToHttpResponseMessage%2A> </xref:System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage"></xref> from which to create the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message> instance.
